comments: Promote events by sending the flyers to organizations.

class_and_prof: AAS 151 Fundamentals of Public Speaking, Margeaux Gamboa-Wong

comments:
This was a great event! Thank you!! 

I think it would be important for future events to include captions within the zoom event/program to improve accessibility for DHH students.
I LOVE IT AND WE NEED MORE OF IT ! THANK YOU
I really appreciated the various topics that were covered, and the emphasis at the end on actions steps we can take to make change on a macro level without our own institution.
Try add live subtitles if possible
Loved having the community speaker, campus speakers and student speakers- well rounded experience from various perspectives. Explaining the historical context was also helpful.
WE NEED MORE OF THIS THANK YOU

I attended on behalf of President Beck, it was an incredible teach-in inclusive of our brilliant student voices! I would appreciate the recording to share those student voices with her and to make sure that I captured all of the perspectives in my notes.
I think that the presentation was very informative and clear so at the moment I donâ€™t think there are any adjustments to be made.
Can you please share the recording of the event
I love that speakers shared their true experience. However, I would have liked the teach-in tied more historical data and statistics.
Maybe a bit more about Speakers names / titles / Info
